Package RobotProjectGUI

Class ControllableRobot

java.lang.Object
RobotProjectGUI.ArenaItem
RobotProjectGUI.Robot
RobotProjectGUI.ControllableRobot
public class ControllableRobot extends Robot
Author:
dijan Class used to represent a robot that can be controlled by the player.
